timeZoneInput.label: Timezone
timeZoneInput.changeWarning: You have changed the timezone. All individually created sessions and tutorial free days will be deleted. Only schedules sessions will be recreated in the new time zone. Are you absolutely sure you want to do this?
timeZoneInput.explanation: The time zone in which the tutorial groups occur. This will be used to interpret the start and end times of the tutorial groups. You can search for a time zone by typing into the field.
timeZoneInput.requiredValidationError: You need to select a time zone!

periodInput.label: Tutorial Group Period
periodInput.explanation: The period in which the tutorial groups occur in the semester. This will the default schedule of every tutorial group. It can be overridden by individual schedules.
periodInput.requiredValidationError: You need to select a period!
periodInput.parseError: Period must be in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD - YYYY-MM-DD'
periodInput.invalidRangeError: Period must be a valid date range
